events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking number shows no updates.
The issue has been identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's message regarding late shipment.
This case was assigned to delivery support agent Jessica H. for further investigation.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand your order is delayed, and I’m here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please confirm your order number and provide the tracking number you’ve been using? This will help me check the shipment status.
Sure, the order number is 789456123, and the tracking number I have is TRK123XYZ. The tracking site hasn’t updated for several days.
I’ve contacted the shipping provider about your order. We expect an updated tracking status within 48 hours, and we will expedite delivery if possible.
Thank you for the quick response and for looking into this. I appreciate your help and look forward to the update.
The shipping provider has updated your package status confirming it is out for delivery and will arrive today.
We just wanted to confirm that your order was successfully delivered. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since your issue has been resolved, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day!
